poemsDataJson.list_full: 春(はる)の夜(よ)の 夢(ゆめ)ばかりなる 手枕(たまくら)に かひなく立(た)たむ 名(な)こそ惜(を)しけれ
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: If I lay my head//Upon his arm in the dark//Of a short spring night,//This innocent dream pillow//Will be the death of my good name.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Haru no yo no|Yume bakari naru|Ta-makura ni|Kainaku tatan|Na koso oshi kere
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: かひなくたたむ なこそをしけれ
poemsDataJson.author: 周防内侍(すおうのないし)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: たわむれに契っては浮き名が立つと、断る気持ち
